creditline: Gift of Stephen Addiss and Audrey Yoshiko Seo
description: 14 lines of text, with vertical linear elements; horizontal sheet format
text:
This congratulatory letter is written to an unknown friend of the high ranking courtier and literati scholar, Konoe Nobutada:
I have surely received your letter of the ninth: I congratulate you on being granted an increased stipend in Yoshū [Io, Ehime, Shikoku] from the Shogunate. Awaiting the time in the near future when you can come up to our province. I was much pleased to receive you good letter—congratulations, congratulations!
title: Letter of Congratulations
